posts.postText: Is it possible to add an option that threads will auto-lock after so many weeks of being dead?

I doubt it, but that would make it alot easier XD
No accidentaly bumping old threads.

>> I doubt it, but that would make it alot easier XD
No accidentaly bumping old threads. 


The Age of a thread really isnt as important as whether the topic itself is dead or the post is contributing
